title: 9: No Such Thing As A Word For 'Silent Fart'
content: This week in the QI Office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm) and Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) discuss wig theft, un-claimed elephant sperm, hermits at the bottom of the garden & more...
